item.title: Bangladeshi faces US charges over “selling fake documents”
item.description: A Bangladeshi national has been accused in a US court of allegedly operating online platforms that sold fake templates of identity documents, including passports, social security cards and driving licences. Zahid Hasan, 29, from Dhaka, faces nine charges, Montana District Attorney Kurt Alme said.
